title: Cross Product of Two Vectors
description: This function calculates the cross product of two 3-dimensional vectors. The function takes two input vectors, A and B, and computes the resulting vector perpendicular to both A and B.
name: V3_XPRO

input.name: A
input.description: The first input vector for the cross product operation.

input.name: B
input.description: The second input vector for the cross product operation.

return_value.description: The resulting vector that is the cross product of vectors A and B.

fields.name: X
fields.description: The x-component of the resulting cross product vector.

fields.name: Y
fields.description: The y-component of the resulting cross product vector.

fields.name: Z
fields.description: The z-component of the resulting cross product vector.
